Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 27th overall pick, by Los Angeles (A) in 2007...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Pittsburgh on 2/4/2008 (Going to PIT: 1B L. Duda, RF D. Ortmeier. Going to LAA: 2B A. Cardenas)...
Injured on 6/22/2009 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/30/2010, off Ryan Franklin (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/4/2010, off Ramon Ortiz (CHN)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 9/26/2012...
Drove in 8 runs against Washington on 9/6/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/5/2015, hitting .524 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/9/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2017, hitting .435 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 4/27/2019...
Drove in 8 runs against San Diego on 9/26/2020...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/27/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $1,050,000 per year...
Released by Kansas City on 6/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 6/26/2021 to a minor league deal...
Released by St. Louis on 7/3/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/3/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $1,050,000 per year...
Injured on 7/21/2021 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
